DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research compare effectiveness conventional physical therapy ( manual physical therapy , exercise , range motion , stretch ) versus conventional physical therapy combine dry needling patient knee osteoarthritis ( OA ) . Physical therapist commonly use conventional physical therapy technique dry needle treat knee OA , study attempt find addition dry needling conventional physical therapy equal , great , less effect conventional physical therapy alone .
DOC.brief_title: Dry Needling Versus Conventional Physical Therapy Patients With Knee Osteoarthritis
DOC.detailed_description: Patients knee OA randomize receive 1-2 treatment per week 6 week ( 10 session total ) either : ( 1 ) Dry Needling conventional physical therapy ( 2 ) Conventional physical therapy ( manual physical therapy , exercise , range motion stretch )
